headline: MSCI Warning On Indonesia Highlights Power Of Its Market Benchmarks
summary: MSCI has issued a warning on data transparency and trading irregularities on the Indonesia Stock Exchange. The index provider signaled that Indonesia could be reclassified from an emerging market to a frontier market in its indices. Any reclassification decision would have implications for index fund allocations and international capital flows linked to MSCI benchmarks. For investors following NYSE:MSCI, this move reflects the influence the company holds over how global equity markets are...
